name: dBASE Multiple Index Backup File
summary: An MBK file is a backup of a Multiple Index ( .MDX file) automatically created by dBase, a database management program. Users can restore the indexes associated with the .DBF Database file with dBASE if the MDX file becomes corrupt.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Various Alcatel, Motorola, and Vodafone mobile phone backup utilities
